title: Houshold talke or, Good councell for a married man Deliuered in a prittie dialogue, by Roger a batchelor, to Simon, a (iealous) married-man. To the tune of Buckle and thong-a.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
publisher: printed for the assignes of Thomas Simcocks, and are to bee sold by Francis Grove, dwelling vpon Snow-hill,
notes: Signed: M. P., i.e. Martin Parker.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
